From: Yanshosh@...

::Rex::

Rex enters the Brig's CR room, looking at the chamber. By this time, 
the bot that had been in there should have gone into stasis, but if 
she'd stayed awake through the CR proccess, which was designed to put 
a bot into stasis anyways, she might have stayed awake through this 
one.

"Doors, seal," he says, "Vent, lock."

The door closes and locks behind him, the security system on the 
vents (repeated steel covers) also initiating.

"Firesystem, activate."

Dozens of sprinklers activate, showering water down from the cealing. 
If anything was invisible, it would be seen...

"CR 2 open," was Rex's final command, the CR chamber opening and Rex 
standing with his gun aimed at it, along with a few autoguns and 
flamethrowers (The flamethrowers would do no good now), aimed at the 
CR.
